node.description: A community developed Java SDK to interact with the æternity blockchain.

A maven plugin to generate java classes for smart contracts from sophia source code. The generated classes make use of the aepp-sdk-java and provide methods to deploy contracts and call the respective entrypoint functions.
A demo application that uses our aepp-sdk-java to claim names on the æternity blockchain.
A simple mobile application that shows how to include our aepp-sdk-java and transfer AE from Alice to Bob.
A demo application that shows how to make use of our contraect-maven-plugin. The generated Java classes enable unit testing of Sophia smart contracts using Java.
The best user interface for the æternity blockchain. Users can observe activities on the blockchain and even perform actions when they establish a connection to their wallet.
